com.horaz.client.model
Class BaseModel

java.lang.Object
  com.horaz.client.model.BaseModel

public abstract class BaseModel
extends java.lang.Object

Models represent the data in your app. To create a own Model you have to extend the this class. Every Model has to implement the getStructure method. This method must return the fields of the model. At this point we can also set a validation rule for the fields

See Also:
http://www.dev-horaz.com/dev-guide/create-a-model

getStructure

protected abstract BaseModel.ModelField[] getStructure()
Every model has to implement the getStructure method. This method must return the fields of the model. At this point we can also set a validation rule for the fields.

Returns:
array of ModelField. For every field a ModelField.
